# What's Going On

The Latest Feed

PMPRO is updated with new articles on the 1st and 15th every month. Together they form a single "edition" for that month.

Check here for the latest contributions to "The Cookbook" and find out who leads our contributors list.

# #001 Edition - November

Title Description Contributor
Triage Features > Handle a large amount of product feedback at a time. Paul Fischer
Data Driven Product Management > Instrumenting your app to capture product events Paul Fischer
Prioritizing Features (RICE) > How to know what to build first? Paul Fischer
The Sprint Log > Thoughtfully plan out your new application and plot the work over time. Paul Fischer
Project Stages > Find out how software projects move through stages. Paul Fischer
Scope of Work > Get new customers quickly with this template to guide new feature development Paul Fischer
Onboarding to New Products > New to a company? Ramp up as PM quickly using this as a reference Paul Fischer
Product One-Pager > Can you articulate what your product does in one page? Paul Fischer
